enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: An internal pulse counter register update is not in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: An internal pulse counter register update is in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: NONE
enumeratedValue.description: No debug signals output.

enumeratedValue.name: LCC0_LCC1
enumeratedValue.description: (LC Mode) DBG0 = CMP0OUT, DBG1 = CMP1OUT.

enumeratedValue.name: LCC0_INT0
enumeratedValue.description: (LC Mode) DBG0 = CMP0OUT, DBG1 = INTEG0.

enumeratedValue.name: LCC1_INT1
enumeratedValue.description: (LC Mode) DBG0 = CMP1OUT, DBG1 = INTEG1.

enumeratedValue.name: INT0_INT1
enumeratedValue.description: (Any Mode) DBG0 = INTEG0 DBG1 = INTEG1.

enumeratedValue.name: CMP0_CMP1
enumeratedValue.description: (Switch Mode) DBG0 = CMP0OUT, DBG1 = CMP1OUT.

enumeratedValue.name: CMP0_INT0
enumeratedValue.description: (Switch Mode) DBG0 = CMP0OUT, DBG1 = INTEG0.

enumeratedValue.name: CMP1_INT1
enumeratedValue.description: (Switch Mode) DBG0= CMP1OUT, DBG1 = INTEG1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The pulse counter remains in quadrature mode during a flutter event.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The pulse counter switches from quadrature mode to dual mode during a flutter event.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The pulse counter continues operating during a flutter event.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The 24-bit counters stop counting during a flutter event.

enumeratedValue.name: SWITCH
enumeratedValue.description: Select the switch closure topology.

enumeratedValue.name: LC
enumeratedValue.description: Select the LC resonant topology.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the pulse counter.

enumeratedValue.name: SINGLE
enumeratedValue.description: Select single channel mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DUAL
enumeratedValue.description: Select dual channel mode.

enumeratedValue.name: QUADRATURE
enumeratedValue.description: Select quadrature mode.

enumeratedValue.name: 32_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator low threshold to 32% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 36_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator low threshold to 36% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 40_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator low threshold to 40% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 44_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator low threshold to 44% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 48_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator high threshold to 48% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 52_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator high threshold to 52% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 56_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator high threshold to 56% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: 60_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Set the digital comparator high threshold to 60% of VIO.

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_PASS
enumeratedValue.description: Continue to calibrate until a passing condition occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: UNTIL_FAIL
enumeratedValue.description: Continue to calibrate until a failing condition occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: Use full pull-up mode.

enumeratedValue.name: SMALL
enumeratedValue.description: Use small pull-up mode.

enumeratedValue.name: MEDIUM
enumeratedValue.description: Use medium pull-up mode.

enumeratedValue.name: LARGE
enumeratedValue.description: Use large pull-up mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Pull-ups are enabled automatically by hardware.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Always enable the pull-ups.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable input grounding.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable input grounding. The IN0 and IN1 inputs are grounded.

enumeratedValue.name: IN0
enumeratedValue.description: Calibrate the IN0 input.

enumeratedValue.name: IN1
enumeratedValue.description: Calibrate the IN1 input.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The automatic calibration operation did not succeed.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The automatic calibration operation succeeded.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A calibration operation is not in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A calibration operation is in progress. Hardware will clear this flag when the operation completes.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Stretch the LC comparator output low pulses by approximately 20 ns.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Stretch the LC comparator output high pulses by approximately 20 ns.

enumeratedValue.name: NONE
enumeratedValue.description: No pulse extension.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Set the comparator 0 threshold to the low range (0 V to VIO/8 in 48 steps).

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: Set the comparator 0 threshold to a full range (0 V to VIO in 64 steps).

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Set the comparator 1 threshold to the low range (0 V to VIO/8 in 48 steps).

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: Set the comparator 1 threshold to a full range (0 V to VIO in 64 steps).

enumeratedValue.name: 0_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 0 mV low-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 5_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 5 mV low-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 10_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 10 mV low-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 20_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 20 mV low-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 0_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 0 mV high-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 5_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 5 mV high-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 10_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 10 mV high-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 20_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set both LC comparators to use 20 mV high-side hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: 5_US
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 0 (slowest response time, lowest power consumption).

enumeratedValue.name: 1_US
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 1.

enumeratedValue.name: 400_NS
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 2.

enumeratedValue.name: 200_NS
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 3 (fastest response time, highest power consumption).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Use LC comparator 0 as an input to counter 0 and LC comparator 1 as an input to counter 1.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Use LC comparator 0 as an input to both counter 0 and counter 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware automatically turns LC comparator 0 on and off.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Force LC comparator 0 always on.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware automatically turns LC comparator 1 on and off.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Force LC comparator 1 always on.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The bias 0 pulse is a full width (minimum 2 RTC cycles).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The bias 0 pulse is delayed 1/2 an RTC cycle and de-asserts 1/2 an RTC cycle early (minimum 3 RTC cycles).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The bias 1 pulse is a full width (minimum 2 RTC cycles).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The bias 1 pulse is delayed 1/2 an RTC cycle and de-asserts 1/2 an RTC cycle early (minimum 3 RTC cycles).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable wake up events.

enumeratedValue.name: WZONEP
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the start of zone P.

enumeratedValue.name: WZONEA
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the start of zone A.

enumeratedValue.name: WZONEB
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the start of zone B.

enumeratedValue.name: WZONEC
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the start of zone C.

enumeratedValue.name: WZONED
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the start of zone D.

enumeratedValue.name: WEND
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the end of the LC sequence.

enumeratedValue.name: WKSTOP
enumeratedValue.description: Wake or interrupt at the end of the LC sequence and stop the sequencer when this event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not start the sequencer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Start the sequencer.

enumeratedValue.name: 4_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 4 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 8 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 16_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 16 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 32_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 32 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 64_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 64 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 128_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 128 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 256_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 256 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 512_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 512 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 1024_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 1024 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 2048_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 2048 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: 4096_CYCLES
enumeratedValue.description: Set the period to 4096 RTC cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: SINGLE_SAMPLE
enumeratedValue.description: Set the module to single sample mode and disable the period counter after the next completion of the sequencer. In this mode, firmware must start each sample by setting FLCSEN to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: CONSECUTIVE_SAMPLE
enumeratedValue.description: Set the module to consecutive sample mode and disable the period counter. After completing zone D, the timing engine will jump directly to zone A, skipping both the W and P zones.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic tracking.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic tracking. A new MAX value of any size will increase both the MAX and MIN by 1, and a new MIN value of any size will decrease both the MAX and MIN by 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic center discriminator mode. Firmware must set the CD0 and CD1 fields.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic center discriminator mode. Hardware will keep the CD0 and CD1 fields centered between MAX and MIN.

enumeratedValue.name: ZERO
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT0 is less than CD0.

enumeratedValue.name: MINUS1
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT0 is less than CD0 - 1.

enumeratedValue.name: MINUS2
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT0 is less than CD0 - 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MINUS3
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT0 is less than CD0 - 3.

enumeratedValue.name: ZERO
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT1 is less than CD1.

enumeratedValue.name: MINUS1
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT1 is less than CD1 - 1.

enumeratedValue.name: MINUS2
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT1 is less than CD1 - 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MINUS3
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition occurs if LCCOUNT1 is less than CD1 - 3.

enumeratedValue.name: ZONEA
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone A as the active zone for counter 0 (LCIN0 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONEB
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone B as the active zone for counter 0 (LCIN0 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONEC
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone C as the active zone for counter 0 (LCIN0 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONED
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone D as the active zone for counter 0 (LCIN0 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONEA
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone A as the active zone for counter 1 (LCIN1 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONEB
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone B as the active zone for counter 1 (LCIN1 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONEC
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone C as the active zone for counter 1 (LCIN1 input).

enumeratedValue.name: ZONED
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone D as the active zone for counter 1 (LCIN1 input).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the pulse 0 output (LCPUL0).

enumeratedValue.name: C_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone C only as the active zone for the pulse 0 output (LCPUL0).

enumeratedValue.name: A_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone A only as the active zone for the pulse 0 output (LCPUL0).

enumeratedValue.name: A_AND_C
enumeratedValue.description: Select zones A and C as the active zones for the pulse 0 output (LCPUL0).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the pulse 1 output (LCPUL1).

enumeratedValue.name: C_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone C only as the active zone for the pulse 1 output (LCPUL1).

enumeratedValue.name: A_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Select zone A only as the active zone for the pulse 1 output (LCPUL1).

enumeratedValue.name: A_AND_C
enumeratedValue.description: Select zones A and C as the active zones for the pulse 1 output (LCPUL1).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable pulse mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TOGGLE
enumeratedValue.description: Toggle at the start of zone A or zone C.

enumeratedValue.name: PULSE_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Set the pulse mode to idle high, pulse low.

enumeratedValue.name: PULSE_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Set the pulse mode to idle low, pulse high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 0 during zone C.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 0 during zone C.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 0 during zone B.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 0 during zone B.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 0 during zone A.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 0 during zone A.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 0 during zone P.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 0 during zone P.

enumeratedValue.name: PULSE_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Set bias 0 to idle high, pulse low.

enumeratedValue.name: PULSE_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Set bias 0 to idle low, pulse high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 1 during zone C.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 1 during zone C.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 1 during zone B.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 1 during zone B.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 1 during zone A.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 1 during zone A.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable bias 1 during zone P.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable bias 1 during zone P.

enumeratedValue.name: PULSE_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Set bias 1 to idle high, pulse low.

enumeratedValue.name: PULSE_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Set bias 1 to idle low, pulse high.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the bias signals.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the bias signals externally only (LCBIAS0 and LCBIAS1 outputs).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Use the bias signals internally only.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Use the bias signals externally (LCBIAS0 and LCBIAS1 outputs) and internally.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse asserts throughout zone A or zone C with a single-ended comparator using the counter and discriminator.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse asserts throughout zone A or zone C with differential comparators using the counter and discriminator.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse asserts throughout zone A or zone C with a single-ended comparator sampling and holding at the end of the LC pulse.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse asserts throughout zone A or zone C with differential comparators sampling and holding at the end of the LC pulse.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE4
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at the beginning of zone A or C and stops with the timer with a single-ended comparator using the counter and discriminator.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE5
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at the beginning of zone A or C and stops with the timer with differential comparators using the counter and discriminator.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE6
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at the beginning of zone A or C and stops with the timer with a single-ended comparator sampling and holding at the end of the LC pulse.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE7
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at the beginning of zone A or C and stops with the timer with differential comparators sampling and holding at the end of the LC pulse.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE8
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at beginning of zone A or C and stops with the rising edge of the external stop input (STOPx) with a single-ended comparator using the counter and discriminator.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE9
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at beginning of zone A or C and stops with the falling edge of the external stop input (STOPx) with single-ended comparators using the counter and discriminator.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE10
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at beginning of zone A or C and stops with the rising edge of the external stop input (STOPx) with a single-ended comparator sampling and holding at the end of the LC pulse.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE11
enumeratedValue.description: The LC pulse starts at beginning of zone A or C and stops with the falling edge of the external stop input (STOPx) with single-ended comparators sampling and holding at the end of the LC pulse.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE12
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate a pulse with a single-ended comparator using the timer and discrimintor.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE13
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate a pulse with differential comparators using the timer and discrimintor.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE14
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate a pulse with a single-ended comparator sampling and holding at the end of the zone.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE15
enumeratedValue.description: Do not genreate a pulse with differential comparators sampling and holding at the end of the zone.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_IN_PROGRESS
enumeratedValue.description: A calibration operation is not in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start an oscillator calibration or a calibration operation is in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Connect integrator to 24 bit counter state machine logic.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disconnect the integrators from the IN0 and IN1 inputs.

enumeratedValue.description: The integrator 0 output is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The integrator 0 output is high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The integrator 1 output is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The integrator 1 output is high.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Neither of the counters overflowed.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: One of the counters overflowed.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A digital comparator 0 and counter 0 match did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A digital comparator 1 and counter 1 match did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.description: An integrator output transition did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A quadrature error did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A quadrature error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A flutter detection end event did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A flutter detection start event did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: START

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED

enumeratedValue.name: DECRYPT

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.name: XOR_DISABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the error interrupt. An interrupt is generated when the Input/Output Data FIFO Overun (DORI), Input/Output Data FIFO Underun (DURI), or XOR Data FIFO Overrun (XORI) flags are set.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the operation complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the operation complete interrupt. An interrupt is generated when the Operation Complete Interrupt (OCI) flag is set.

enumeratedValue.name: DIRECT
enumeratedValue.description: Connects the NMUX signal to CMP- and the PMUX signal to CMP+.

enumeratedValue.name: CMPP_VSS
enumeratedValue.description: Connects VSS to CMP- and the PMUX signal to CMP+.

enumeratedValue.name: CMPP_DAC
enumeratedValue.description: Connects the NMUX signal to CMP-, the PMUX signal to the Comparator DAC voltage reference, and the DAC output to CMP+.

enumeratedValue.name: CMPN_DAC
enumeratedValue.description: Connects the PMUX signal to CMP+, the NMUX signal to the Comparator DAC voltage reference, and the DAC output to CMP-.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 0 (fastest response time, highest power consumption).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 1.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 3 (slowest response time, lowest power consumption).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the comparator falling edge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the comparator falling edge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the comparator rising edge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the comparator rising edge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the negative input weak pull up.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the negative input weak pull up.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the positive input weak pull up.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the positive input weak pull up.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable negative hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: NEG_5_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set negative hysteresis to 5 mV.

enumeratedValue.name: NEG_10_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set negative hysteresis to 10 mV.

enumeratedValue.name: NEG_20_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set negative hysteresis to 20 mV.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable positive hysteresis.

enumeratedValue.name: POS_5_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set positive hysteresis to 5 mV.

enumeratedValue.name: POS_10_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set positive hysteresis to 10 mV.

enumeratedValue.name: POS_20_MV
enumeratedValue.description: Set positive hysteresis to 20 mV.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the comparator output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the comparator output.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The output voltage (VDC) is below the threshold set in the RDYLOWTH threshold field (RDYLOWTH).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The output voltage (VDC) is above the threshold set in the RDYLOWTH threshold field (RDYLOWTH).

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The output voltage (VDC) has not exceeded 105% of the programmed output value.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The output voltage (VDC) has exceeded 105% of the programmed output value.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The input voltage (VBATDC) is more than 0.4 V above the output voltage (VDC). The DC-DC converter is not in dropout.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The input voltage (VBATDC) is less than 0.4 V above the output voltage (VDC). The DC-DC converter is in dropout, and firmware should enable the bypass switch (BEN=1).

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The bandgap voltage is not above the threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The bandgap voltage is above the threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the DC-DC local oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the DC-DC local oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: DCDCOSC
enumeratedValue.description: Select the local DC-DC oscillator as the clock source.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Select the APB clock as the clock source.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the APB clock divided by 1 as the converter switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV2
enumeratedValue.description: Use the APB clock divided by 2 as the converter switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV4
enumeratedValue.description: Use the APB clock divided by 4 as the converter switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV8
enumeratedValue.description: Use the APB clock divided by 8 as the converter switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV16
enumeratedValue.description: Use the APB clock divided by 16 as the converter switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not synchronize the ADC to the DC-DC converter.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Synchronize the ADC to the DC-DC converter.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the APB clock input.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the APB clock input.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the ADC clock derived from the DC-DC switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the ADC clock derived from the DC-DC switching frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable DC-DC module interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable DC-DC module interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable pulse skipping.

enumeratedValue.name: 10_NS
enumeratedValue.description: Set the minimum pulse width to 10 ns.

enumeratedValue.name: 20_NS
enumeratedValue.description: Set the minimum pulse width to 20 ns.

enumeratedValue.name: 40_NS
enumeratedValue.description: Set the minimum pulse width to 40 ns.

enumeratedValue.name: SWSEL0
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 0. Set the M1 and M2 power switches to each use one MOSFET only.

enumeratedValue.name: SWSEL1
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 1. Set the M1 and M2 power switches to each use 2 MOSFETS in parallel.

enumeratedValue.name: SWSEL2
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 2. Set the M1 and M2 power switches to each use 3 MOSFETS in parallel.

enumeratedValue.name: SWSEL3
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 3. Set the M1 and M2 power switches to each use 4 MOSFETS in parallel.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable DC-DC synchronous mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable DC-DC asynchronous mode. This mode is more efficient for very light output loads.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic bypass.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic bypass.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the MBYP bypass switch.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the MBYP bypass switch.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the DC-DC converter.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the DC-DC converter.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT1
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 200 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT2
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 300 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT3
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 400 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT4
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 500 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT5
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 600 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT6
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 700 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT7
enumeratedValue.description: Limit the peak inductor current to 800 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_TOO_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Generate an interrupt when the regulated converter output voltage is too low, according to the RDYLOWF flag.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_NOT_TOO_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Generate an interrupt when the regulated converter output voltage is not too low according to the RDYLOWF flag.

enumeratedValue.name: OUT_OF_REG
enumeratedValue.description: Generate an interrupt when the output voltage is out of regulation. The converter output can be either too high or too low, according to the RDYLOWF and RDYHIGHF flags.

enumeratedValue.name: IN_REG
enumeratedValue.description: Generate an interrupt when the output voltage is in regulation.

enumeratedValue.name: 95_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets the RDYLOWF flag if the regulated output voltage is greater than 95% of the programmed output voltage.

enumeratedValue.name: 90_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets the RDYLOWF flag if the regulated output voltage is greater than 90% of the programmed output voltage.

enumeratedValue.name: 85_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets the RDYLOWF flag if the regulated output voltage is greater than 85% of the programmed output voltage.

enumeratedValue.name: 80_PERCENT
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets the RDYLOWF flag if the regulated output voltage is greater than 80% of the programmed output voltage.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The DTM module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the DTM module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The inhibit signal is inactive.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The inhibit signal is active.

field.name: DSTREQF
field.description: Destination Peripheral DMA Request Status Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The destination peripheral did not request a DMA transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The destination peripheral requested a DMA transfer.

field.name: SRCREQF
field.description: Source Peripheral DMA Request Status Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The source peripheral did not request a DMA transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The source peripheral requested a DMA transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The DTM module does not ignore DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The DTM module ignores DMA requests until this bit is cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timeout error has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timeout error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA error has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A state transition or timeout has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A state transition (SECSTIEN or PRISTIEN set to 1) or timeout (TOERRIEN = 1) occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the DTM module.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the DTM module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable master counter decrements.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable master counter decrements.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable timeouts and timeout interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable timeouts and timeout interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable secondary state transition interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable secondary state transition interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable primary state transition interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable primary state transition interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: REVA
enumeratedValue.description: Revision A.

enumeratedValue.name: REVB
enumeratedValue.description: Revision B.

enumeratedValue.name: REVC
enumeratedValue.description: Revision C.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not initialize the CRC module to the value set by the SEED bit.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Initialize the CRC module to the value set by the SEED bit.

enumeratedValue.name: ALL_ZEROES
enumeratedValue.description: CRC seed value is all 0's (0x00000000)

enumeratedValue.name: ALL_ONES
enumeratedValue.description: CRC seed value is all 1's (0xFFFFFFFF).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable CRC operations.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable CRC operations.

enumeratedValue.name: CRC32_FIXED
enumeratedValue.description: Select the fixed 32-bit polynomial: 0x04C11DB7.

enumeratedValue.name: CRC16_PROG
enumeratedValue.description: Select the programmable 16-bit polynomial. The POLY register sets the polynomial coefficients.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable byte mode (word/byte width is determined automatically by the hardware).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable byte mode (all writes are considered as bytes).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: No byte-level bit reversal (input is same order as written).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Byte-level bit reversal enabled (the bits in each byte are reversed).

enumeratedValue.name: NO_REORDER
enumeratedValue.description: No byte reorientation (output is same order as input).

enumeratedValue.name: BIG_ENDIAN_16
enumeratedValue.description: Swap for 16-bit big endian order (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B2 B3 B0 B1).

enumeratedValue.name: BIG_ENDIAN_32
enumeratedValue.description: Swap for 32-bit big endian order (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B0 B1 B2 B3).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic seeding.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic seeding. Reading the byte of the DATA register selected by ASEEDSEL re-seeds the CRC result with the setting selected by SEED.

enumeratedValue.name: LSB_READ
enumeratedValue.description: Select a read of the least-significant byte ([7:0]) of DATA, RDATA or BRDATA for automatic re-seeding.

enumeratedValue.name: MSB_READ
enumeratedValue.description: Select a read of the most-significant byte [31:24] for 32-bit operations, and [15:8] for 16-bit operations) of DATA, RDATA or BRDATA for automatic re-seeding.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic bus snooping.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic bus snooping.

enumeratedValue.name: WRITES
enumeratedValue.description: ECRC will snoop writes to the selected peripheral.

enumeratedValue.name: READS
enumeratedValue.description: ECRC will snoop reads from the selected peripheral.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the input ready interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the input ready interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the output ready interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the output ready interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Reset the module.

enumeratedValue.name: SMALL
enumeratedValue.description: Manchester encode operations generate a half-word output, and decode operations generate a byte output.

enumeratedValue.name: LARGE
enumeratedValue.description: Manchester encode operations generate a word output, and decode operations generate a half-word output.

enumeratedValue.name: DECODE
enumeratedValue.description: Decode data written to DATAIN.

enumeratedValue.name: ENCODE
enumeratedValue.description: Encode data written to DATAIN.

enumeratedValue.name: MANCHESTER
enumeratedValue.description: The operation selected by EDMD uses Manchester mode.

enumeratedValue.name: 3OUTOF6
enumeratedValue.description: The operation selected by EDMD uses Three-out-of-Six mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not bypass ENCDEC operations.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass ENCDEC operations.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable DMA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable DMA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The ENCDEC module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the ENCDEC module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_CHANGE
enumeratedValue.description: The module outputs data to DATAOUT in the same order as it was processed (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B3 B2 B1 B0).

enumeratedValue.name: HALF_WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The module flips the data in half-words before outputting to DATAOUT (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B2 B3 B0 B1).

enumeratedValue.name: WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The module flips the data in words before outputting to DATAOUT (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B0 B1 B2 B3).

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER_THREE_BYTES
enumeratedValue.description: The module flips the lower three bytes before outputting to DATAOUT (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B3 B0 B1 B2).

enumeratedValue.name: NO_CHANGE
enumeratedValue.description: Data written to DATAIN is processed in the order written (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B3 B2 B1 B0).

enumeratedValue.name: HALF_WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The module flips the DATAIN input data in half-words (input: B2 B3 B0 B1, output: B3 B2 B1 B0).

enumeratedValue.name: WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The module flips the DATAIN input data in words (input: B0 B1 B2 B3, output: B3 B2 B1 B0).

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER_THREE_BYTES
enumeratedValue.description: The module flips the lower three bytes of the DATAIN input data (input: B3 B0 B1 B2, output: B3 B2 B1 B0).

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The input FIFO is not ready for new data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Firmware can write new input data to DATAIN.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The output data is not ready.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The output data is ready to be read by firmware.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: No output data FIFO underrun.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: An output data FIFO underrun has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: No input data FIFO overrun.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: An input data FIFO overrun has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Set the APB as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: TIMER0
enumeratedValue.description: Set Timer 0 low overflows divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: HL_ECI
enumeratedValue.description: Set high-to-low transitions on ECI divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSCN
enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator module output (EXTOSCn) divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: ECI
enumeratedValue.description: Set ECI transitions divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: LIMIT

enumeratedValue.name: CH0

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA channel is not servicing an EPCA control transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: BUSY
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA channel is busy servicing an EPCA control transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the non-differential channel outputs (Channels 0-5) for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the differential output from Channel 2 and non-differential outputs from Channels 0, 1, 2, and 3 for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the differential outputs from Channels 1 and 2 and non-differential outputs from Channels 0 and 1 for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: THREE_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select three differential outputs from Channels 0, 1, and 2 for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the EPCA counter overflow/limit event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the EPCA counter overflow/limit event interrupt.

field.name: OVFDEN
field.description: EPCA Counter Overflow/Limit DMA Request Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not request DMA data when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Request DMA data when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

field.name: OVFSEN
field.description: EPCA Counter Overflow/Limit Synchronization Signal Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send a synchronization signal when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send a synchronization signal when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA registers will automatically load any new update values after an overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA registers will not load any new update values after an overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will stop the EPCA counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT0
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 0, Comparator0 output.

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT1
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 1, Comparator1 output.

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT2
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 2, Timer 0 high overflow.

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT3
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 3, Timer 1 high overflow.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition (falling edge) on EPCAnTx will start the counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: A low-to-high transition (rising edge) on EPCAnTx will start the counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the input trigger (EPCAnTx). The EPCA counter/timer will continue to run if the RUN bit is set regardless of the value on the input trigger.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the input trigger (EPCAnTx). If RUN is set to 1, the EPCA counter/timer will start running when the selected input trigger (STSEL) meets the criteria set by STESEL. It will not stop running if the criteria is no longer met.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The clock divider is currently in the first half-cycle.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The clock divider is currently in the second half-cycle.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the flash at speed mode 0.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the flash at speed mode 1.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the flash at speed mode 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the flash at speed mode 3.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable read store mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable read store mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Data accesses are excluded from the prefetch buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Data accesses are included in the prefetch buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Any reads from flash are prefetched until the prefetch buffer is full.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Inhibit the prefetch engine.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable sequential write mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable sequential write mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the WRDATA field will initiate a write to flash at the address in the WRADDR field.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the WRDATA field will initiate an erase of the flash page containing the address in the WRADDR field.

enumeratedValue.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: The flash controller write data buffer is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: The flash controller write data buffer is full.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The flash interface is not busy.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The flash interface is busy with an operation.

enumeratedValue.name: SLOW
enumeratedValue.description: Configure the flash read controller for AHB clocks below 12 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: FAST
enumeratedValue.description: Configure the flash read controller for AHB clocks above 12 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transaction is not currently taking place.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transaction is currently taking place.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: ACK has not been received. Write: Do not send an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: ACK received. Write: Send an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Arbitration lost error has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Arbitration lost error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: ACK has not been requested.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: ACK requested.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stop is not pending and a stop / repeat start has not been detected. Write: Clear the STO bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Stop or stop / repeat start detected. This bit must be cleared by firmware. Write: Generate a stop.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A start is not pending and a repeat start has not been detected. Write: Clear the STA bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start or repeat start detected. This bit must be cleared by firmware. Write: Generate a start or repeat start.

enumeratedValue.name: RECEIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Module is in receiver mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TRANSMIT
enumeratedValue.description: Module is in transmitter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE
enumeratedValue.description: Module is operating in Slave mode.

enumeratedValue.name: MASTER
enumeratedValue.description: Module is operating in Master mode.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stop interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the stop interrupt flag (STOI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Stop interrupt detected. In Slave mode, a stop has been detected on the bus. In Master mode, a stop has been generated. Write: Force a stop interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An acknowledge interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An acknowledge interrupt occurred. Write: Force an acknowledge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the receive done interrupt (RXI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Receive done interrupt occurred. Write: Force a receive done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the transmit done interrupt (TXI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Transmit done interrupt detected. If the transmit is forced to abort by a NACK response, the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI) will also be set. Write: Force a transmit done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the start interrupt (STAI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start or repeat start interrupt occurred. In Slave mode, a start or repeat start is detected. In Master mode, a start or repeat start has been generated.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An arbitration lost interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the arbitration lost interrupt (ARBLI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Arbitration lost interrupt detected. Write: Force an arbitration lost interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt (T0I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 0 overflow interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: No interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt (T1I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 1 overflow interrupt is detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt (T2I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 2 overflow interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt or SCL low timeout has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt (T3I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 3 overflow or SCL low timeout interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable data and address reception.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the module to perform a receive operation.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable data and address transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the module to perform a transmit operation.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE_ADDRESS
enumeratedValue.description: Slave address detected.

enumeratedValue.name: GENERAL_CALL
enumeratedValue.description: General Call address detected.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not automatically switch to transmit or receive mode after a Start.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: If automatic hardware acknowledge mode is enabled (HACKEN = 1), automatically switch to transmit or receive mode after a Start.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the input filter.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the input filter.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The I2C module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the I2C module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Slave modes.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Inhibit Slave modes. The module will not respond to a Master on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic hardware acknowledge.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic hardware acknowledge.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: NACK after the last byte is received.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: ACK after the last byte is received.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable General Call address decoding.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable General Call address decoding.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: I2C module is not in soft reset.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: I2C module is in soft reset and firmware cannot access all bits in the module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C module.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C module.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the stop interrupt (STOI).

enumeratedValue.description: Disable the acknowledge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive done interrupt (RXI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit done interrupt (TXI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the start interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the start interrupt (STAI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the arbitration lost interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the arbitration lost interrupt (ARBLI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt (T0I).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt (T1I).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt (T2I).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 3 and SCL low timeout interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 3 and SCL low timeout interrupt (T3I).

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 0 running.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 1.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 1 running.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 2.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 2 running.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 3.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 3 running.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 0: Operate the I2C timer as a single 32-bit timer : Timer Bytes [3 : 2 : 1 : 0].

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 1: Operate the I2C timer as two 16-bit timers : Timer Bytes [3 : 2] and Timer Bytes [1 : 0].

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 2: Operate the I2C timer as four independent 8-bit timers : Timer Byte 3, Timer Byte 2, Timer Byte 1, and Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 3: Operate the I2C timer as one 16-bit and two 8-bit timers : Timer Bytes [3 : 2], Timer Byte 1, and Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable I2C Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable I2C Timer for general purpose use. This setting should not be used when the I2C module is enabled (I2CEN = 1).

field.name: T0RL
field.description: Timer Byte 0 Reload / Bus Free Timeout.

field.name: T1RL
field.description: Timer Byte 1 Reload / SCL High Time.

field.name: T2RL
field.description: Timer Byte 2 Reload / SCL Low Timeout Bits [11:4].

field.name: T3RL
field.description: Timer Byte 3 Reload / SCL Low Timeout Bits [19:12].

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable I2C DMA data requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable I2C DMA data requests.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT8
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT8 (Timer 0 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT9
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT9 (Timer 0 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT10
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT10 (Timer 1 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT11
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT11 (Timer 1 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT12
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates on the rising edge of the trigger source selected by ETRIG.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT13
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates on the falling edge of the trigger source selected by ETRIG.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT14
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates on any edge of the trigger source selected by ETRIG.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT15
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates on write to DATA register (On Demand).

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT0
enumeratedValue.description: Select DACnT0 (DAC0T0 routed through crossbar) as the IDAC external trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT1
enumeratedValue.description: Select DACnT1 (RESERVED) as the IDAC external trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT2
enumeratedValue.description: Select DACnT2 (RESERVED) as the IDAC external trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT3
enumeratedValue.description: Select DACnT3 (RESERVED) as the IDAC external trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT4

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT5

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT6
enumeratedValue.description: Select DACnT6 (RESERVED) as the IDAC external trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT7
enumeratedValue.description: Select DACnT7 (RESERVED) as the IDAC external trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_MA
enumeratedValue.description: The full-scale output current is 0.5 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_MA
enumeratedValue.description: The full-scale output current is 1 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_MA
enumeratedValue.description: The full-scale output current is 2 mA.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_10_BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Writes are interpreted as one 10-bit sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_10_BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Writes are interpreted as two 10-bit samples.

enumeratedValue.name: 4_8_BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Writes are interpreted as four 8-bit samples.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Read: No DMA operations are occurring or the DMA is done. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A DMA operation is currently in progress. Write: Start a DMA operation.

enumeratedValue.name: RIGHT
enumeratedValue.description: Data is right-justified.

enumeratedValue.name: LEFT
enumeratedValue.description: Data is left-justified.

enumeratedValue.name: RESET
enumeratedValue.description: Initiate a data buffer reset.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The selected trigger source will cause the IDAC output to update.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The selected trigger source will not update the IDAC output, except for On-Demand DATA writes.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC will not wrap when it reaches the end of the data buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC will cycle through the data buffer contents.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the FIFO overrun interrupt (ORI).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the FIFO overrun interrupt (ORI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the FIFO underrun interrupt (URI).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the FIFO underrun interrupt (URI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the FIFO went empty interrupt (WEI).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the FIFO went empty interrupt (WEI).

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the IDAC module to halt (ignore update triggers).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the internal load resistor.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the internal load resistor.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the IDAC.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the IDAC.

enumeratedValue.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: The data FIFO is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: 1WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The data FIFO contains one word.

enumeratedValue.name: 2WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: The data FIFO contains two words.

enumeratedValue.name: 3WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: The data FIFO contains three words.

enumeratedValue.name: 4WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: The data FIFO is full and contains four words.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A FIFO overrun has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A FIFO overrun occurred. Write: Force a FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A FIFO underrun has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A FIFO underrun occurred. Write: Force a FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A FIFO went empty condition has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: The FIFO is empty. Write: Force a FIFO went empty interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Writing a 1 to TMRSET initiates a copy of the value from the COUNT register into the internal timer register. This field is automatically cleared by hardware when the copy is complete and does not need to be cleared by software.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Writing a 1 to TMRCAP initiates a read of internal timer register into the COUNT register. This field is automatically cleared by hardware when the operation completes and does not need to be cleared by software.

field.name: HSMDEN
field.description: High Speed Timer Access Mode Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable high speed timer access mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable high speed timer access mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the LPTIMER0 output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the LPTIMER0 output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the timer overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the timer overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the timer compare 0 event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the timer compare 0 event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer overflows do not modify the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer overflows set the Low Power Timer output to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 0 events do not modify the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 0 events clear the Low Power Timer output to 0.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the timer compare 1 event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the timer compare 1 event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 1 events do not modify the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 1 events set the Low Power Timer output to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the LPTIMER0 output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the LPTIMER0 output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 0 events do not reset the timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 0 events reset the timer.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 1 events do not reset the timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare 1 events reset the timer.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the clock to the Low Power Timer module.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the clock to the Low Power Timer module.

enumeratedValue.description: The Low Power Timer module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the Low Power Timer module to halt.

field.name: RUN
field.description: Timer Run Control and Compare Threshold Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop the timer and disable the compare threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start the timer running and enable the compare threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer overflow has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer overflow occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer compare 0 event has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer compare 0 event occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer compare 1 event has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer compare 1 event occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is not saturated low.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is saturated low.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is not saturated high.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is saturated high.

field.name: LCKI
field.description: Phase-Lock and Frequency-Lock Locked Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO is disabled or not locked.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO is enabled and locked.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Saturation (high and low) interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Saturation (high and low) interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The PLL locking does not cause an interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt is generated if LCKI matches the state selected by LCKPOL.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The lock state PLL interrupt will occur when LCKI is 0.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The lock state PLL interrupt will occur when LCKI is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: RTC0TCLK
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the RTC0 oscillator (RTC0TCLK).

enumeratedValue.name: LPOSC0DIV
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the divided Low Power Oscillator (LPOSC0).

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSC0
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the external oscillator output (EXTOSC0).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: In phase-lock and frequency-lock modes, spectrum spreading, and dithering operate normally, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: In phase-lock and frequency-lock modes, spectrum spreading, and dithering are prevented from updating the output of the DCO.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Automatic DCO output dithering disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Automatic DCO output dithering enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Lock DCO output frequency to the falling edge of the reference frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Lock DCO output frequency to the rising edge of the reference frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is off.

enumeratedValue.name: DCO
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is in Free-Running DCO mode.

enumeratedValue.name: FLL
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is in frequency-lock mode (reference source required).

enumeratedValue.name: PLL
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is in phase-lock mode (reference source required).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Spectrum Spreading.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING1
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.1% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING2
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.2% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING3
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.4% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING4
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.8% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING5
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 1.6% of TDCO.
